entry.title: Startech JLFL-100 - Led Flashlight 500 Lumens 849818
entry.summary:
Vendor: Startech
Type: Flashlights
Price: 112.32

[shortdesc]

LED Flashlight - 500 Lumens

  • Highly efficient Cree Surface Mounted Diodes (SMD) element produces an intense ultra-bright white light
  • SMD technology is more robust and produces more light than standard LED bulbs
  • Up to 100,000 hours lifetime
  • Machined aluminum reflector gathers and focuses light for maximum output
  • Advanced Focus System allows user to focus from spot to wide angle beam
  • Aircraft grade aluminum body for durability and resistance to corrosion
  • Premium Stage III anodization resists scratches and meets military specifications
  • IPX-6 water resistant rating
  • Drop tested to 1.5 meters
  • Gold plated contacts prevent corrosion
  • 5-way switch cycles between 100%, 50%, 25%, flashing, and SOS model
  • Tail mounted switch for tactical applications (except model 849818 - JLFL-500)
  • Reverse polarity protection prevents damage if batteries are inserted incorrectly
  • Includes batteries, lanyard, and spare o-rings
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Startech
    Line Startech
    Length 10 Inch
    Product Type Flashlights
    Size 11/16 Inch

    Extra Product Information

  • SMD Technology
  • Up to 100,000 hours lifetime

    • Product Information

  • Run Time @ 50% : 10 hrs
  • Run Time @ 25% : 20 hrs
  • Beam Distance : 300 m
  • Batteries : 2 x D
    		•

entry.title: Startech ISFL-120 - 6-3/4 Inch Intrinsically Safe Flash Light 849702
entry.summary:
Vendor: Startech
Type: Flashlights
Price: 84.53

[shortdesc]

6-3/4 Inch Intrinsically Safe Flashlight

  • Intrinsically safe flashlights for use where flammable gasses, vapours, and liquids or combustible dusts and ignitable fibres are present
  • Certified to cULus Class I Division I, Class II Division I, and Class III Division I – the highest standards in the world
  • Totally sealed to prevent micro sparks from exiting flashlight
  • IP67 waterproof to 1m
  • Specially designed valve permits hydrogen gas produced by batteries to exit flashlight, preventing accumulations that could be ignited by internal sparks
  • Security screw is designed to prevent casual replacement of batteries while working in volatile environments
  • Cree XP-E SMD element produces extremely bright light while providing excellent run time
  • High and low output modes
  • Drop tested to 1m
  • Complete with belt clip
  • Can be mounted to hard hat with optional clip set (849709) - model 849702 (ISFL-120) only
  • Includes 4 AA batteries
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Startech
    Line Startech
    Length 6-3/4 Inch
    Product Type Flashlights

    Extra Product Information

  • Intrinsically safe flashlights for use where flammable gasses, vapours, and liquids or combustible dusts and ignitable fibres are present
  • Certified to cULus Class I Division I, Class II Division I, and Class III Division I – the highest standards in the

    • Product Information

  • Beam Distance - High Power : 230 m
  • Beam Distance - Low Power : 110 m
  • Batteries : 4 x AA

entry.title: Startech CPL-110 - Cob Penlight 849808
entry.summary:
Vendor: Startech
Type: Penlights
Price: 15.65

[shortdesc]

COB Penlight

  • Combination flashlight and worklight in a handy, compact size
  • COB (Chip On Board) technology provides long life, robust construction, and a more diffused, natural light
  • Magnetic pocket clip allows light to be mounted to metal surfaces for hands-free operation
  • 5 function switch cycles from 100% - 50% - flashing worklight – flashlight – off
  • Soft touch grip is resistant to shop chemicals
  • Includes 3 x AAA batteries
  • Distributors: Sold in 12 piece display only
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information
